searchUrl.title: Search URL (Optional)
searchUrl.description: Direct Justia search URL to scrape from. If provided, other search parameters will be ignored. Example: https://www.justia.com/lawyers/criminal-law/california

practiceArea.title: Practice Area
practiceArea.description: Legal practice area to search for (e.g., 'criminal-law', 'family-law', 'personal-injury', 'business-law'). Use hyphens to separate words. Required if searchUrl is not provided.

location.title: Location
location.description: State or city to search for lawyers (e.g., 'california', 'new-york', 'texas'). Use hyphens to separate words. Required if searchUrl is not provided.

maxLawyers.title: Maximum Lawyers
maxLawyers.description: Maximum number of lawyer profiles to scrape (0 = unlimited).

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Safety cap for pagination (0 = unlimited). Helps prevent runaway crawls.

fetchFullProfiles.title: Fetch Full Profiles
fetchFullProfiles.description: Whether to visit each lawyer's detail page to extract additional information (biography, education, bar admissions, languages). This will increase scraping time but provides more comprehensive data.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode to save diagnostic snapshots when pages return 0 results. Useful for troubleshooting extraction issues.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Recommended for reliable scraping.
